micropolisj.engine

Class Micropolis

  • java.lang.Object
    • micropolisj.engine.Micropolis

  • public class Micropolis
extends java.lang.Object
    The main simulation engine for Micropolis. The front-end should call animate() periodically to move the simulation forward in time.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Micropolis.FinancialHistory 
      static class  Micropolis.History 
      static interface  Micropolis.Listener
      The listener interface for receiving miscellaneous events that occur in the Micropolis city.

    • Field Detail

      • pollutionMem

        public int[][] pollutionMem
        For each section of the city, the pollution level of the city (0-255). 0 is no pollution; 255 is maximum pollution. Updated each cycle by ptlScan(); affects land value.

      • crimeMem

        public int[][] crimeMem
        For each section of the city, the crime level of the city (0-250). 0 is no crime; 250 is maximum crime. Updated each cycle by crimeScan(); affects land value.

      • popDensity

        public int[][] popDensity
        For each section of the city, the population density (0-?). Used for map overlays and as a factor for crime rates.

      • rateOGMem

        public int[][] rateOGMem
        For each section of the city, the rate of growth. Capped to a number between -200 and 200. Used for reporting purposes only; the number has no affect.

      • cityHallList

        public java.util.ArrayList<CityLocation> cityHallList
